import React from 'react'; import { QRCodeSVG } from 'qrcode.react'; export default function PaymentScreen({ paymentInfo, message, onCopyPayment, onSimulatePayment, onCancel }) { if (!paymentInfo) { return (

Payment Required

Generating invoice...

); } return (

Payment Required

{message}

Amount: {paymentInfo.amountSats} SATS (~${paymentInfo.amountUSD})
Open Payment Page {paymentInfo.demo && ( )}
); }
